questions.question: What is Siritunga Jayasuriya's current political position?
questions.answer: Siritunga Jayasuriya is the leader of the United Socialist Party.

questions.question: Which political parties was Siritunga Jayasuriya a member of before leading the United Socialist Party?
questions.answer: Siritunga Jayasuriya was formerly a member of the Lanka Sama Samaja Party and later the Nava Sama Samaja Party.

questions.question: How many times has Siritunga Jayasuriya run for the Sri Lankan presidency?
questions.answer: Siritunga Jayasuriya has run for the Sri Lankan presidency in every election from 2005 to 2019 and is planning to run in 2024.

questions.question: What was Siritunga Jayasuriya's best performance in a presidential election?
questions.answer: In 2005, Siritunga Jayasuriya won 35,405 votes, which was 0.36% of the votes cast and came third. This was his best performance in a presidential election.

questions.question: What significant event involving Siritunga Jayasuriya occurred in early 2007?
questions.answer: In early 2007, Siritunga Jayasuriya narrowly escaped a raid by 300 armed thugs at a place where an anti-war rally against the Sri Lankan Civil War was due to take place.

questions.question: What source provides information about Siritunga Jayasuriya's presidential candidacy in 2024?
questions.answer: Information about Siritunga Jayasuriya's presidential candidacy in 2024 can be found in the News First article dated 15 August 2024.
